q1: Juventus is my favourite Italian football team. What about you?
a1: It would have to AC Milan for me.
q4: What is so good about him?
a4: Cristiano is the most dominant player soccer has ever seen. The skills, the strength, etc. This guys is a phenom!
q5: For his age Ronaldo is a freak of nature. He has and will maintain the same level for a number of years yet
a5: I don't see how Ronaldo can maintain his competitive level at his age.
